sentences: Haruka Shimotsuki (霜月はるか, Shimotsuki Haruka, born November 15, 1986) is a Japanese singer and dōjin music composer known for her vocal themes in the Atelier Iris and Ar tonelico series.
Haruka Shimotsuki started her career in 2001 beginning with singing main themes for games, and writing and composing songs.
As an independent singer, she was once a supporting member of Sound Horizon, and made an appearance as a guest singer in their 2006 concert.
She took a more major role in Sound Horizon's album Moira and performed in the corresponding live concerts in 2008 and 2009.
Haruka Shimotsuki held a solo concert, Tokeidai no Aru Machi yori (時計台のある街より): Haruka Shimotsuki Solo Live Lv.1 on August 10, 2006.
Her second solo concert, Haruka Shimotsuki solo live Lv.2: Shimotsuki Haruka wa Level ga 1 Agatta (シモツキンはレベルが１あがった), was held on July 13, 2008.
